sentences.en: He is accused of harboring an escaped convict.

sentences.cn: 他遭人污辱,说他给判过刑.

sentences.en: He was stigmatized as an ex-convict.
sentences.cn: 他遭人污辱，说他给判过刑。

sentences.en: I have all the evidence necessary to convict this young criminal now.
sentences.cn: 我掌握一切必要的证据来给这个年轻犯人定罪.

sentences.en: It was difficult to convict him of the falsity of his beliefs.
sentences.cn: 难以使他认识到他信仰的虚假性.

sentences.en: So, while Melbourne was not a convict settlement, it wasn't squeaky - clean either.
sentences.cn: 由此可见, 早先的墨尔本虽不是流放犯的聚居地, 但也不是十分清白的.

sentences.en: The convict has to serve his sentence.
The convict was pardoned after serving five years of his sentence.
The escaped convict was seized outside the city.
The ex - convict found a base employment for himself.
sentences.cn: 那个过去被判过刑的人找到了一份卑微的工作.

sentences.en: The fingerprints found on the gun were used to convict her.
sentences.cn: 枪上发现的指纹被用来判明她有罪.

sentences.en: The police have tracked down the escaped convict.
They have brought the escaped convict to bay.
sentences.cn: 他们已经使那逃亡的囚犯无处可逃.

sentences.en: Yes, sir, they turned loose every convict who was willing to fight.
sentences.cn: 的的确确的, 先生, 他们把所有愿意打仗的犯人都放掉.

sentences.en: You'll be facing a Federal rap for aiding and abetting an escaped convict.
sentences.cn: 因涉嫌协助和教唆越狱囚犯，你将面临联邦指控。
